name: mastodon-tag-notifier
description: This app does one little thing, and does it well.

client_id.description: Mastodon App Client key. You can get it in settings page > Development > Application

client_secret.description: Mastodon App Client secret. You can get it in settings page > Development > Application

access_token.description: Mastodon App Your access token. You can get it in settings page > Development > Application

url.description: The domain of the Mastodon instance to which you want to add the bot.

bot_id.description: Account ID of the bot. For example, you can get from url, <mastodon domain>/accounts/<bot_id>
